programme.title: תמיד היית שם
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית כיפית ומרגשת. כשיוצרת של אפליקציית דייטינג עומדת בפני פשיטת רגל, היא משתפת פעולה עם יזם צעיר ומבטיח כדי להציל את החברה שלה. עם: מרלי קולינס, אדם הוליק. במאי: ג'ים קליף. קנדה, 2023.

programme.title: עוד בקשה מסתורית
programme.desc: מותחן קומי בכיכובן של אנה קנדריק ובלייק לייבלי. סטפני טסה לקפרי לשמש שושבינה בחתונת אמילי עם איל הון מסתורי. החגיגה הופכת למותחן רצחני עם סודות, בגידות וזהויות כפולות, כשהחברות ביניהן עומדת שוב למבחן. במאי: פול פייג, 2025.

programme.title: אידיוט לארוחה
programme.desc: קומדיה. רואה חשבון מוזמן על ידי הבוס שלו להשתתף בתחרות סודית, שבה המנצח הוא זה שמביא לארוחה את האדם הטיפש ביותר. בדיוק אז הוא נתקל באידיוט המושלם. עם: סטיב קארל, פול ראד, זאק גאליפנאקיס. במאי: ג'יי רוץ'. 2010.

programme.title: טקסי בהילוך 5
programme.desc: החמישי בסדרת קומדיות האקשן מבית היוצר של לוק בסון. שוטר נשלח למארסיי ומתבקש לתפוס כנופייה המסתייעת ברכב מהיר במיוחד. כדי לעצור אותה הוא נעזר בשותף מקומי וגם במונית העל המפורסמת... עם:פרנק גסטמבייד (שגם ביים). צרפת, 2018.

programme.title: חתונה יפהפייה
programme.desc: קומדיית המשך רומנטית ל"אסון יפהפה". אחרי לילה פרוע בווגאס, זוג חברים מתעוררים בבוקר ומגלים כי הם התחתנו. כיאה לזוג נשוי, הם נוסעים לירח דבש מטורף במקסיקו, שם החוף והפיתויים מעמידים את הקשר הטרי במבחן. עם: דילן ספראוס. 2024.

programme.title: משקלו הבלתי נסבל של כשרון ענק
programme.desc: קומדיית אקשן בכיכובו של ניקולס קייג' (המגלם את עצמו) ופדרו פסקל. בעודו עומד בפני משבר כלכלי ויצירתי, קייג' מגוייס על ידי סוכנת CIA ונדרש להפיח חיים בדמויות אשר גילם בעבר. במאי: טום גורמיקן. 2022.

programme.title: הכפיל
programme.desc: קומדיית אקשן מהנה בכיכובם של ריאן גוסלינג ואמילי בלאנט. כפיל ופעלולן ותיק שעזב את העסק שנה קודם לכן כדי להתמקד בבריאותו, מוצא את עצמו שב לעסקי השעשועים כשכוכב בינ"ל בסרט אולפנים ענק - בבימוי האקסית שלו, נעדר. 2024.

programme.title: הדייט שתקע אותי
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית. מגישת טלוויזיה מבלה לילה חד פעמי עם בחור בטלן שפגשה בבר. כשהיא מגלה שנכנסה להיריון, הם מנסים לתת צ'אנס לזוגיות למרות כל ההבדלים ביניהם. עם: קתרין היגל, סת' רוגן, פול ראד. במאי: ג'אד אפאטו. ארה"ב, 2007.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.

programme.title: תמיד היית שם
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית כיפית ומרגשת. כשיוצרת של אפליקציית דייטינג עומדת בפני פשיטת רגל, היא משתפת פעולה עם יזם צעיר ומבטיח כדי להציל את החברה שלה. עם: מרלי קולינס, אדם הוליק. במאי: ג'ים קליף. קנדה, 2023.

programme.title: משקלו הבלתי נסבל של כשרון ענק
programme.desc: קומדיית אקשן בכיכובו של ניקולס קייג' (המגלם את עצמו) ופדרו פסקל. בעודו עומד בפני משבר כלכלי ויצירתי, קייג' מגוייס על ידי סוכנת CIA ונדרש להפיח חיים בדמויות אשר גילם בעבר. במאי: טום גורמיקן. 2022.

programme.title: משחק מכור (2001)
programme.desc: קומדיית כדורגל. שחקן כדורגל מהולל לשעבר שמרצה עונש בבית סוהר קשוח, צריך לארגן משחק בין האסירים והסוהרים. עם: ויני ג'ונס, ג'ייסון סטאת'ם. במאי: בארי סקולניק. ארה"ב, 2001.

programme.title: ממלכת אור הירח
programme.desc: סרטו המקסים של ווס אנדרסון ('מלון גרנד בודפשט'). שנה לאחר שנפגשו והתאהבו, בורחים סם וסוזי מהשגחת המבוגרים ומתבודדים בחוף סודי, בעוד כל העיירה מחפשים אחריהם. עם: ברוס וויליס, אדוארד נורטון, ביל מארי. במאי: ווס אנדרסון. 2012.

programme.title: אחרונת השושבינות
programme.desc: דרמה רומנטית מרגשת. כשבקה, השושבינה הקבועה של כל חברה, פוגשת צלם חתיך באחת החתונות, היא מקווה שההמתנה הארוכה לעבור משושבינה לכלה סוף-סוף הסתיים. עם: רייצ'ל בוסטון, פול קמפבל. במאי: מארק ג'ין. ארה"ב, 2019.

programme.title: ילדות רעות
programme.desc: קומדיית נעורים. לאחר שנים בחו"ל מגיעה קיידי לראשונה בחייה לתיכון אמריקאי. במהרה היא מגלה שהרבה יותר קל לשרוד בג'ונגל מאשר עם הבנות המקובלות בביה"ס. עם: לינדזי לוהן, רייצ'ל מקאדמס, טינה פיי. במאי: מארק ס.ווטרס. 2004.

programme.title: סברינה (הריסון פורד)
programme.desc: עיבוד מחודש לקומדיה הרומנטית הקלאסית. איש עסקים עשיר מתאהב בסברינה, בת הנהג המקסימה. אחיו המנסה להפסיק את הרומן העשוי לחבל בעסקה חשובה, נכבש אף הוא בקסמיה. עם:הריסון פורד, ג'וליה אורמונד. במאי: סידני פולק. ארה"ב, 1995.

programme.title: והרי החדשות
programme.desc: קומדיה. שדרן חדשות אגדי בשנות ה-70 מגלה לתדהמתו שהתחנה החליטה להביא אישה שתגיש לצדו. יחד עם עמיתיו הנאמנים, הוא מחליט להילחם במגישה החדשה. עם: וויל פרל, כריסטינה אפלגייט, פול ראד, סטיב קארל, סת' רוגן. במאי: אדם מקיי. 2004.

programme.title: אתם מוזמנים חגיגית
programme.desc: קומדיה משוגעת! כששתי חתונות נקבעות בטעות באותו מקום, אבי הכלה האחת ואחותה של הכלה השנייה נאבקים ראש בראש, בלי לבחול בדבר, כדי לערוך חגיגה בלתי נשכחת לאהוביהם. עם: וויל פרל, ריס וית'רספון. במאי: ניקולאס סטולר. ארה"ב, 2025.

programme.title: לדפוק התמחות
programme.desc: קומדיה. שני אנשי מכירות החוששים לעתידם המקצועי בעידן הדיגיטלי רוצים להוכיח שהם עדיין רלוונטיים. הם מצטרפים להתמחות נחשקת בחברת גוגל, ונאלצים להתחרות בגאוני היי-טק צעירים. עם: אוון ווילסון, וינס ווהן. במאי: שון לוי. 2013.

programme.title: לגדול עם ההורים
programme.desc: קומדיה משפחתית מקסימה ונוגעת ללב. בת מתבגרת להורים עם צרכים מיוחדים מנסה ללהטט בין לימודים, חברים, עבודה בבריכה וטיפול בהוריה. במהרה היא מגלה שלהתבגר זה לא פשוט בכלל. עם: קירנן שיפקה, צ'רלי פלאמר. במאי: מאט סמאקלר. 2022.(n)

programme.title: באה לעזרת נסיך
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית. עוזרת אישית זריזה ומסורה, רגילה להתמודד עם כל מצב בעולמם של הסלבס. כשנסיך מגיע לניו יורק כדי להתכונן לנשף מסכות נוצץ, היא מוצאת את עצמה נשבית בקסמו. עם: אמנדה ניקולס, סקוט קופר. במאי: בריטני גודווין. 2024.(n)

programme.title: אתם מוזמנים חגיגית
programme.desc: קומדיה משוגעת! כששתי חתונות נקבעות בטעות באותו מקום, אבי הכלה האחת ואחותה של הכלה השנייה נאבקים ראש בראש, בלי לבחול בדבר, כדי לערוך חגיגה בלתי נשכחת לאהוביהם. עם: וויל פרל, ריס וית'רספון. במאי: ניקולאס סטולר. ארה"ב, 2025.(n)

programme.title: הכפיל
programme.desc: קומדיית אקשן מהנה בכיכובם של ריאן גוסלינג ואמילי בלאנט. כפיל ופעלולן ותיק שעזב את העסק שנה קודם לכן כדי להתמקד בבריאותו, מוצא את עצמו שב לעסקי השעשועים כשכוכב בינ"ל בסרט אולפנים ענק - בבימוי האקסית שלו, נעדר. 2024.(n)

programme.title: בלונדינית בעיר הגדולה
programme.desc: קומדיה רומנטית. נערה נוסעת לניו יורק בעקבות אהוב לבה ומגלה שבן זוגה חוגג עם נשים אחרות. היא מחליטה לא להתייאש, מוצאת עבודה ועד מהרה, אף אהבה. עם: ג'סיקה סימפסון, לוק ווילסון. במאי: סקוט מרשל. ארה"ב, 2008.(n)

programme.title: מרגלת מתבגרת (מיילי סיירוס)
programme.desc: קומדיית נעורים בכיכובה של מיילי סיירוס. לאחר שעזבה את הקולג' כדי לעבוד לצד אביה החוקר הפרטי, מקבלת נערה צעירה וקשוחה משימה מה-FBI, לחזור לקולג' כסוכנת סמויה. עתה היא יוצאת להרפתקה של חייה. עם: ג'רמי פיבן. 2012.(n)

programme.title: האקסית של החברה שלי
programme.desc: קומדיה בכיכובו של זאק בראף ("סקראבס"). מורה חביב מברוקלין מגיע עם אהובתו השפית לעיר הולדתה בקוויבק כדי להיבחן על תפקיד במסעדת מישלן. למורת רוחו הוא מגלה כי הבוסית העתידית שלה היא במקרה גם המאהבת לשעבר שלה. קנדה, 2024.(n)

programme.title: בארב & סטאר עושות את פלורידה
programme.desc: קומדיה מהיוצרות של "מסיבת רווקות". שתי החברות הותיקות, בארב וסטאר, יוצאות להרפתקה של פעם בחיים כשהן מחליטות לעזוב את העיירה הקטנה שלהן בארה"ב בפעם הראשונה. עם: אנני מומולו, קריסטן ויג. במאי: ג'וש גרינבאום. ארה"ב, 2021.(n)

programme.desc: כל סרטי הילדים והמשפחה מהערוץ זמינים עבורכם ללא תוספת תשלום עכשיו ב-yesVOD KIDS. ערוץ yes MOVIES KIDS משדר בסופי שבוע ובחגים.(n)

programme.title: מיסטר לינק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות זוכת גלובוס הזהב. יצור מפלצתי גדול ממדים וטוב לב, פונה לחוקר מפלצות נודע ומבקש שיוביל אותו לחיק משפחתו הרחוקה. השניים יוצאים למסע המרתק, אך אינם מודעים לסכנות האורבות. במאי: כריס באטלר. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: ווילי - מהיר וחייכני (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב קורע של שחר חסון. ווילי הוא רכב מונית, אך בתוכו פועם מנוע של מכונית מרוץ. בעזרת חבריו הוא יוצא להרפתקה כדי לחלץ את אהובת לבו בלה, מכונית אדומה ויפהפייה שנחטפה ע"י כנופיית משאיות. 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: תעלול של משלוח (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. המשך ללהיט "תעלול של טיול". צמד החברים מהג'ונגל, הדוב מיק מיק ואוסקר הארנב יוצאים להרפתקה מסמרת שיער בכדור פורח, כדי לאתר את הוריו של גור דוב גריזלי קטן ונטוש. דיבוב עב': אמנון וולף, אור דגן. 2022.

programme.title: גיבורה בהפתעה-טובים ה-2 מן האחד (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה, המשך עלילותיה של מגי הוומבטית הגיבורה. שנה לאחר שהפכה לגיבורה, כעת על מגי וסוויטי לשלב כוחות יחד ולהציל את העיר לאחר שגאון טכנולוגי מרושע מאיים ללכוד את כולם במציאות מדומה "משולמת". דיבוב עב': עדי ארד. 2023.

programme.title: לעוף על אפריקה: חברות מעל הכל (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. ריצ'רד הוא ציפור דרור שגדל במשפחת חסידות. לאחר שלא מורשה לנדוד עם החסידות צפונה, הוא יוצא למסע עצמאי משלו, מלא בסכנות והרפתקאות, יחד עם ינשוף מצחיק, חבר דמיוני ותוכי נרקיסיסטי. דיבוב: איתי סלומו. 2023.

programme.title: ביגפוט ג'וניור 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. מספר חודשים לאחר שחזר לביתו, מחליט ביגפוט לעזוב שוב את בנו אדם ולצאת להציל עמק באלסקה מתאגיד דלק אכזרי. כשהוא נעלם באורח מסתורי, יוצא אדם למסע חיפושים אחר אביו. 2020. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על הירח (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בפרבר שכונתי, חבוי מתחת לבית מסתור ענקי, מתגורר גרו, המתכנן את השוד הגדול בהיסטוריה - הוא הולך לגנוב את הירח. גרו מוכן לכל קרב, עד למפגשו עם שלוש יתומות. דיבוב: עידן אלתרמן. במאי: פייר קופין. 2010. כ' עב'.\r\n.

programme.title: מיסטר לינק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות זוכת גלובוס הזהב. יצור מפלצתי גדול ממדים וטוב לב, פונה לחוקר מפלצות נודע ומבקש שיוביל אותו לחיק משפחתו הרחוקה. השניים יוצאים למסע המרתק, אך אינם מודעים לסכנות האורבות. במאי: כריס באטלר. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: איש הכלב (אנימציה) (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית אקשן לכל המשפחה מהיוצרים של "קפטן תחתונים"! לאחר פציעת עבודה משותפת, שוטר וכלבו מתאחדים והופכים לגיבור על בשם איש הכלב. כעת, עליו להציל את העולם מפיטי החתול המרושע. דיבוב: יובל בינדר, סער בדישי. ארה"ב, 2025.

programme.title: סוניק - הסרט 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: הקיפוד האהוב והמהיר בעולם חוזר בהרפתקה משודרגת! סוניק נאלץ להתמודד מול נאקלס, אויב עוצמתי מהכוכב שלו, שעוזר לד"ר רובוטניק הרשע להשיג אבן איזמרגד משמידת עולמות. עם: ג'ים קארי. דיבוב: לירון לב. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. 2022 כ' עב'.

programme.title: אמילי והיגואר האחרון (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה, מאת היוצרים של 'מיה והאריה הלבן'. נערה צעירה, אשר גדלה בכפר קטן למרגלות האמזונס, חוזרת אליו לאחר שנים, כדי להציל את חברה היגואר אותו נטשה, מפני סוחרי בע"ח. דיבוב עב': מונה מור. 2024.

programme.title: גנוב על הירח
programme.desc: אנימציה. בפרבר שכונתי, חבוי מתחת לבית מסתור ענקי, מתגורר גרו, המתכנן את השוד הגדול בהיסטוריה - הוא הולך לגנוב את הירח. גרו מוכן לכל קרב, עד למפגשו עם שלוש יתומות. קולות: סטיב קארל, ג'ייסון סיגל. במאי: פייר קופין. 2010.

programme.title: צוות ג'ונגל מטריפים ת'עולם (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. הגיבורים האהובים (והמטורללים) של הג'ונגל חוזרים! קצף ורוד ומוזר מתפשט על פני הג'ונגל ויוצר פיצוצים במגע עם מים. החבורה יוצאת למסע חוצה גלובוס כדי להציל את הג'ונגל, לפני שעונת הגשמים תתחיל. דיבוב עב'. 2023.(n)

programme.title: חתול במוזיאון (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. חתול טוב לב ועכבר חובב אומנות מגיעים למוזיאון מפורסם, שם הם חוברים לחבורת חתולים השומרת על אוצרות המוזיאון. כשציור המונה ליזה נגנב, החברות האמיצה בין השניים מצילה את המצב. דיבוב: ספיר דרמון. 2023. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: שרק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה זוכת פרס אוסקר. מפלצת ירוקה ורגזנית, חמור פטפטן ונסיכה יפהפייה יוצאים לעזור לגיבורי האגדות, שסולקו מאדמתם ע"י שליט רשע. במאים: אנדרו אדמסון, ויקי ג'ונסון. ארה"ב, 2001. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.desc: אנימציית אקשן לכל המשפחה מהיוצרים של "קפטן תחתונים"! לאחר פציעת עבודה משותפת, שוטר וכלבו מתאחדים והופכים לגיבור על בשם איש הכלב. כעת, עליו להציל את העולם מפיטי החתול המרושע. דיבוב: יובל בינדר, סער בדישי. ארה"ב, 2025.(n)

programme.title: החתול של שרק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. החתול במגפיים יוצא לעצור פושעים אכזריים שמנסים להשמיד את העולם. אליו מצטרפים חבריו האמיצים כדי לעצור את הרעים בהרפתקה סוחפת ומצחיקה. דיבוב עב': דרור קרן. במאי: כריס מילר. 2011. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: סוניק - הסרט 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: הקיפוד האהוב והמהיר בעולם חוזר בהרפתקה משודרגת! סוניק נאלץ להתמודד מול נאקלס, אויב עוצמתי מהכוכב שלו, שעוזר לד"ר רובוטניק הרשע להשיג אבן איזמרגד משמידת עולמות. עם: ג'ים קארי. דיבוב: לירון לב. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. 2022 כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: סוניק הסרט 3 (מדובב)
programme.desc: סוניק הקיפוד האהוב והמהיר בעולם חוזר להרפתקה מרהיבה חדשה! סוניק, נאקלס וטיילס מתאחדים נגד יריב חדש ועוצמתי בשם שאדו, בעל כוחות חדשים ומיסתוריים שלא נראו כמותם עד כה. עם: ג'ים קארי. דיבוב לעב': לירון לב. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. 2024.(n)

programme.title: קונג פו פנדה 4
programme.desc: הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה המצליחה. לאחר שלוש הרפתקאות מסכנות חיים, נקרא לוחם הדרקון "פו" לגמלאות. על הדרך הוא צריך למצוא ולאמן במהירות לוחם דרקון שיתפוס את מקומו, ואין לו רגע לבזבז... דיבוב: ג'ק בלאק. במאי:מייק מיטשל. 2024.(n)

programme.title: נאפולי - יובנטוס
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. נאפולי - יובנטוס, ליגה איטלקית, מחזור 14, עונת 2025/26. נאפולי ומקטומיניי מחפשים ניצחון 3 ברציפות במאבק על הפסגה, הגברת הזקנה וספאלטי מנסים להיצמד לטופ 4.(n)

programme.title: אסטון וילה - ארסנל

programme.title: ה. ת''א - ה. פ''ת

programme.title: טורינו - קרמונזה
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: ליגה איטלקית 2025/26, מחזור 15: טורינו מארחת את קרמונזה.(n)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Musical set in 1980s New York, following a year in the life of young artists living in the East Village. A would-be film-maker pines for his lost love and an HIV-positive musician tries to recover from his drug addiction, while their landlord abandons his bohemian ways for the pursuit of wealth. Rosario Dawson stars alongside members of the original Broadway cast, including Taye Diggs, Anthony Rapp and Adam Pascal.(n)

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.(n)

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A hardened gambler is forced to repay a debt to a friend by reluctantly coaching a baseball team of underprivileged youngsters from one of Chicago's toughest neighbourhoods. Along the way, however, he discovers an entirely new perspective on life. Sporting drama, starring Keanu Reeves, Diane Lane, John Hawkes and DB Sweeney.(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wife's murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabont's drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Initially she is intrigued by his aloof and distant manner, but soon realises he is harbouring dark secrets and desires. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sadomasochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Bella Heathcote and Rita Ora.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: As tycoon Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia revel in a life of luxury, their happiness is endangered by her former boss. Conclusion of the romantic thriller trilogy based on EL James' novel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Eric Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Parachute
programme.desc: Riley, a young woman recently released from rehab, meets Ethan and finds herself navigating the line between love and a new addiction. Director Brittany Snow's romantic comedy drama, starring Courtney Eaton, Thomas Mann and Dave Bautista.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.(n)

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegel's Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly.(n)

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wife's murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabont's drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows.(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.(n)

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parker's psychological drama, based on William Wharton's novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A nuclear power plant controller discovers a potentially disastrous operational flaw but refuses to report it. A visiting TV journalist and cameraman pick up on the story - but as they struggle to get the news on air, a quick-witted engineer realises the danger is far more pronounced than anyone suspects. Thriller, starring Jane Fonda, Michael Douglas, Jack Lemmon and Scott Brady.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowe's romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Ice skater Tonya Harding rises through the ranks at the US figure skating championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into question by a shocking incident after her ex-husband steps in. Director Craig Gillespie's comedy biopic, starring Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, and Allison Janney, who won a Bafta and an Oscar for her performance.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: A song-and-dance man tires of the bright lights and retires to a farm, but boredom soon prompts him to dream up an ambitious plan for the place. Musical, featuring the classic song White Christmas, starring Bing Crosby, Fred Astaire and Virginia Dale.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era conman meets a canny nine-year-old orphan, whom he realises could be his daughter, and agrees to take her to her aunt. Along the way, he discovers the little girl is just as cunning as he is, and they form a successful criminal partnership. Drama, starring Ryan O'Neal alongside real-life daughter Tatum. With Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: An oil-rigger who has cut himself off from his cultured, middle-class roots reluctantly returns to his family home, with his pregnant girlfriend in tow, after receiving word that his father is dying. However, the homecoming turns into a failure, as the psychological journey has a lasting impact on himself and those closest to him. Drama, with Jack Nicholson, Karen Black, Susan Anspach and Ralph Waite.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: An ageing gunfighter is drawn into the conflict between a land-grabbing cattle baron and a ranching family, but gets wounded in the process. A year later, he returns to town to find the situation has not improved - so along with his sidekick and the drunken town sheriff, he fights to defend the family from its enemies. Western, starring John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan and Ed Asner.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: The Damned United
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling Brian Clough's ill-fated 44-day tenure as boss of Leeds United in 1974, after Don Revie's departure for the job of England's manager. Following his acrimonious split from Derby County and a brief spell at Brighton \u0026 Hove Albion, Clough arrived at Elland Road on a wave of controversy, after previously being an outspoken critic of the club, and struggled to find allies among the playing staff. With Michael Sheen, Timothy Spall, Jim Broadbent and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A hardened gambler is forced to repay a debt to a friend by reluctantly coaching a baseball team of underprivileged youngsters from one of Chicago's toughest neighbourhoods. Along the way, however, he discovers an entirely new perspective on life. Sporting drama, starring Keanu Reeves, Diane Lane, John Hawkes and DB Sweeney.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Initially she is intrigued by his aloof and distant manner, but soon realises he is harbouring dark secrets and desires. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sadomasochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Bella Heathcote and Rita Ora.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: As tycoon Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia revel in a life of luxury, their happiness is endangered by her former boss. Conclusion of the romantic thriller trilogy based on EL James' novel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Eric Johnson.

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. Romantic drama, starring Isabela Merced, Cree and Judy Reyes.(n)

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: A singing and dancing war widow tries to shield her son from her husband's interfering wealthy parents by absconding to New York, where she is reunited with her former showbiz partner. They resurrect their old dance act, while her in-laws begin a campaign to claim custody of their grandchild. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Betty Hutton, Roland Young and Ruth Warrick.(n)

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Musical set in 1980s New York, following a year in the life of young artists living in the East Village. A would-be film-maker pines for his lost love and an HIV-positive musician tries to recover from his drug addiction, while their landlord abandons his bohemian ways for the pursuit of wealth. Rosario Dawson stars alongside members of the original Broadway cast, including Taye Diggs, Anthony Rapp and Adam Pascal.(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: Misfit high-school girl Andie Walsh unexpectedly attracts the attentions of a rich, popular boy, but the course of true love runs far from smoothly when their two worlds collide. Romantic drama, starring Molly Ringwald, Andrew McCarthy, James Spader, Jon Cryer and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mother's decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Comedy drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin.(n)

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite for Christmas in the French Alps, reminiscing their grandfather's first trip. They cherish sisterhood and romance with their guide, Frederic. Romantic comedy drama, starring Ashley Williams and Laci J Mailey.(n)

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscaster's life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boy's hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt and Tamera Mowry-Housley.(n)

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In May 1957, New York mob boss Frank Costello, head of the Luciano crime clan, is shot outside his penthouse elevator. The gunman, Vincent Gigante, acts under orders from Frank's former friend-turned-rival, Vito Genovese, who defies Mafia protocol by ordering the hit without approval from other families. Frank survives, deepening a feud marked by betrayal and Vito's volatile marriage to Anna Vernotico. Director Barry Levinson's drama based on true events, starring Robert De Niro, Cosmo Jarvis and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English village's quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the show's straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer.(n)

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite for Christmas in the French Alps, reminiscing their grandfather's first trip. They cherish sisterhood and romance with their guide, Frederic. Romantic comedy drama, starring Ashley Williams and Laci J Mailey.(n)

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray.(n)

programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the town's annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham (The Gilmore Girls) and Judy Greer.(n)

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa A'zion.(n)

programme.title: Tidings for the Season

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro.(n)

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher.(n)

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Green's thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planet's surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Ho's sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planet's surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Ho's sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun.

programme.desc: Gutfeld looks at the news of the day through a satiric lens fused with pop culture and features refreshing takes on the day's top headlines from FNC personalities, authors, politicians, veterans and comedians.

programme.desc: Lonely widower Tom Hanks becomes a reluctant radio star when his young son calls in to a talk show requesting him a new wife. Classic Nora Ephron romcom with Meg Ryan.

programme.desc: Touching tale about two kids who try to reunite their divorced parents for Christmas, helped by their grandmother (Lauren Bacall) and Santa (Leslie Nielsen).

programme.title: Maps And Mistletoe
programme.desc: A cartographer and an explorer find an unexpected connection while working on a novelty treasure map of the North Pole.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's clumsy son Arthur must save the day when his dad's present delivery system misses someone out. Festive animation with the voices of James McAvoy and Bill Nighy.

programme.desc: Businessman James Stewart is on the brink of suicide when an angel gives him a glimpse of what the world would've been like without him.

programme.desc: Chevy Chase stars as the head of the hapless Griswold family, whose Christmas plans soon descend into chaos.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.

programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss. She can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Show Dogs
programme.desc: After a failed attempt to recover a stolen baby panda, police dog Max reluctantly teams up with a human FBI agent named Frank. With help from their new friends, the crime-fighting duo must now foil another kidnapping

programme.title: Marcel the Shell With Shoes On
programme.desc: Marcel, a 1-inch-tall shell, lives with his grandmother, Connie, the only residents of their town after their neighbors' sudden, mysterious disappearance. When discovered by a guest amongst the clutter of his Airbnb, the short film he posts online brings Marcel millions of passionate fans and a new hope of reuniting with his long-lost family.

programme.title: Ellen DeGeneres: Here and Now
programme.desc: At the Beacon Theater in New York, the comic offers novel observations about everyday realities.

programme.title: Pee-wee as Himself
programme.desc: In the 1980s, Paul Reubens becomes a global sensation with his alter-ego Pee-wee Herman, but fame proves to be a complicated companion.

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: You So Crazy
programme.desc: Filmed at a sold-out Majestic Theater in Brooklyn, N.Y., comedian Martin Lawrence delivers his first full-length stand-up special. programme.desc: From New York City's Town Hall, Marc Maron explores getting older, antisemitism and faith and the superiority of having cats over children; he opens up about the loss of his partner in 2020 and reestablishing his relationship with his father.

programme.title: I Love LA

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: When two brothers find out they might lose their house they are desperate to find a way to keep their home. They find a treasure map and bring some friends along to find it. They are all out looking for the "X" and trying to get away from a group of bad guys who also want the treasure.

programme.title: The Pentagon Wars
programme.desc: Col. James G. Burton (Cary Elwes) protests government waste and poor decisions in the development of a troop carrier.

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: A young man (Miles Teller) and his girlfriend (Anna Kendrick) struggle to find desirable employment after graduating from college.

programme.desc: It's the summer of 1983, and precocious 17-year-old Elio Perlman is spending the days with his family at their 17th-century villa in Lombardy, Italy. He soon meets Oliver, a handsome doctoral student who's working as an intern for Elio's father. Amid the sun-drenched splendor of their surroundings, Elio and Oliver discover the heady beauty of awakening desire over the course of a summer that will

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: When Superman gets drawn into conflicts at home and abroad, his actions are questioned, giving tech billionaire Lex Luthor the opportunity to get the Man of Steel out of the way for good. Will intrepid reporter Lois Lane and Superman's four-legged companion, Krypto, be able to help him before it's too late?

programme.title: Whitney Houston: I Wanna Dance With Somebody
programme.desc: Discovered by record executive Clive Davis, Whitney Houston rises to fame in the 1980s to become one of the greatest singers of her generation.

programme.title: The Monster
programme.desc: A divorced mother and her headstrong daughter must make an emergency late-night road trip to see the girl's father. As they drive through deserted country roads on a stormy night, they suddenly have a startling collision that leaves them shaken but not seriously hurt. programme.title: Women Is Losers
programme.desc: Celina Guerrera attempts to rise above poverty in 1960s San Francisco.

programme.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
programme.desc: In 1770 the young daughter of a French countess develops a mutual attraction to the female artist commissioned to paint her wedding portrait.

programme.title: The Legend of Ochi
programme.desc: In a remote village on the island of Carpathia, a shy farm girl named Yuri is raised to fear elusive animals known as ochi. But when Yuri discovers a wounded baby ochi has been left behind, she escapes on a quest to bring him home.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A scientist (Vincent Price) builds an animated human being -- the gentle Edward (Johnny Depp). The scientist dies before he can finish assembling Edward, though, leaving the young man with a freakish appearance accentuated by the scissor blades he has instead of hands. Loving suburban saleswoman Peg (Dianne Wiest) discovers Edward and takes him home, where he falls for Peg's teen daughter (Winona

programme.title: Elevation
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic survivors find refuge in the Rocky Mountains to hide from giant, insect-like creatures that can't live above 8,000 feet. However, when one of them needs life-saving supplies, they risk it all to venture into the danger zone.

programme.title: Heretic
programme.desc: A diabolical Mr. Reed ensnares two young missionaries in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when they knock on the wrong door and are forced to prove their faith.

programme.title: Get Out

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: When a lively young family moves in next door, grumpy widower Otto Anderson meets his match in a quick-witted, pregnant woman named Marisol, leading to an unlikely friendship that turns his world upside down.

programme.title: Weapons
programme.desc: When all but one child from the same classroom mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

programme.title: Sinners
programme.desc: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their Mississippi hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Young Cole Sear (Haley Joel Osment) is haunted by a dark secret: he is visited by ghosts. Cole is frightened by visitations from those with unresolved problems who appear from the shadows. He is too afraid to tell anyone about his anguish, except child psychologist Dr. Malcolm Crowe (Bruce Willis). programme.title: On Becoming a Guinea Fowl
programme.desc: On an empty road in the middle of the night, Shula stumbles across the body of her uncle. As the funeral unfolds, the cousins unveil the buried secrets of their Zambian family in a vibrant reckoning with the lies we tell ourselves.

programme.title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
programme.desc: In a prison cell somewhere in Latin America, two very different men warily confront each other. Molina (William Hurt) is first seen wrapping his head in a towel, in the shape of a turban, while Valentin (Raul Julia), bearded and classically macho in appearance, watches with a mixture of fascination and revulsion. During the time spent together, the two men come to understand and respect each other

programme.title: Emmanuelle

programme.title: Broken English
programme.desc: Nora Wilder (Parker Posey), a single woman, is heading deep into the doldrums as a result of disappointments in her professional and personal lives. programme.title: Wilson
programme.desc: Feeling lonely and isolated, Wilson (Woody Harrelson) tracks down Pippa (Laura Dern), the ex-wife who left him 17 years earlier. She tells the neurotic and middle-aged misanthrope that he is the father of a teenager named Claire (Isabella Amara). Shocked, excited and hopeful, Wilson embarks on a madcap quest to connect with the daughter he never knew he had.

programme.desc: A smart comedy about a day in the life of a barbershop on the south side of Chicago. Calvin (Ice Cube), who inherited the struggling business from his deceased father, views the shop as nothing but a burden and a waste of his time. After selling the shop to a local loan shark, Calvin slowly begins to see his father's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out.

programme.desc: This sequel to the 2002 film returns to the Chicago barbershop owned by Calvin Palmer Jr. (Ice Cube). However, when a common enemy rears his head, Dom and Brian must learn how to work together and trust one another in order to defeat him.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: With Dom and Letty married, Brian and Mia retired and the rest of the crew exonerated, the globe-trotting team has found some semblance of a normal life. They soon face an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop Cipher from unleashing chaos.

programme.title: Red Dawn

programme.desc: Divorced dad Scott (Tim Allen) has custody of his son (Eric Lloyd) on Christmas Eve.
